definition: lit. don't worry about not knowing goods, but about comparing them (proverb)/fig. goods' (or person's) true value can only be determined through comparison
pinyin: bu4 pa4 bu4 shi2 huo4 , zhi3 pa4 huo4 bi3 huo4
simplified: 不怕不识货，只怕货比货
word: 不怕不識貨，只怕貨比貨

definition: to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
